job1.title: Broken Lightbulb
job1.text: Ran into the lamp because I was rushing. Theres shattered glass everywhere. I tried to clean it up a bit but there are probably still little pieces on the ground. Can you come clean up the glass and replace the lightbulb? Its really dark in here and I enjoy studying here, so if you could come as soon as possible that would be great
